title: 611A.45 PROGRAMS FOR VICTIMS OF CRIME.
text:
The commissioner of public safety shall award grants to programs which provide support services to victims of crime.
Any public or private nonprofit agency may apply to the commissioner for a grant to provide services to victims of crime. The application shall be submitted in a form approved by the commissioner.
Every public or private nonprofit agency which receives a grant to provide services to victims of crime shall comply with rules of the commissioner related to the administration of the grant programs.
